website_summaries.verdict: This Taser is a more affordable Pulse model, best for civilian users who want a non-lethal self-defense weapon.
pros: Looks and handles like a standard handgun
Includes 2 live cartridges and a target
cons: Battery pack includes inferior batteries, limited shelf life
Safety switch configuration is not intuitive

customer_reviews.title: DOES NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: The on off switch did not work & they will not give me my money back or give me one that does work.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Moore

customer_reviews.title: I like this... BUT only 2 stars due to effed up safety selector directionality
customer_reviews.text: The safety is BACKWARDS. EVERY other firearm I own has a safety selector (except my glocks) that you push DOWN and FORWARD... this one is totally backwards, making training with it very difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Antibabylon

customer_reviews.title: Duplicate product . Fake labels .
customer_reviews.text: This is a duplicate product and should be banned from amazon immediately . I matched this item with the original one from the site , and this one is missing major feature like battery power on the top of the gun . This is so stupid . I need my full money back plus interest for disappointment . Shame on u seller.
customer_reviews.author: SURAJ B.

customer_reviews.title: I love this thing
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing. Very user-friendly. Pro tip: pop the clear plastic part off the cartridge before inserting. That tripped me up for a sec. :D Great for women who enjoy outdoor activities solo (biking, hiking, etc.).
customer_reviews.author: Emily Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Bummer
customer_reviews.text: I’m not sure if it’s me but no matter how many times I put in new batteries the taser lights never turn on when the safety is off so apparently I got a faulty gun. I’ve reached out to sellers but haven’t heard back yet. I will update if we get this resolved because for over $400 bucks this fun should be working right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: AlishaLB

customer_reviews.title: Practical to carry
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight, easy to carry, and pretty acurate, especially nice that it has a built in flashlight and laser that activate when the safety is taken off.
customer_reviews.author: deplou122

customer_reviews.title: Easy peezy Lemon Squeezy
customer_reviews.text: Taser has made this about as simple to operate as you could possibly get. Insert the cartridge at the business end, flip up the well marked lever to 'On', light and laser automatically illuminate, so pretty hard to miss day or night. I am only giving 4 stars as I haven't used it yet, so I'm only going off their reputation and track record that it will disable as advertised. (The additional cartridges are a little pricey to be doing much practice firings). That being said, gives the wife peace of mind having it with her, and that's what matters.
customer_reviews.author: George D. Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Battery Died in 2 Months
customer_reviews.text: I love the idea of having this while I walk in the woods with my dog. After only two months, without having fired it even once, my battery has died. Also as far as design goes, the battery is very difficult to install. The cord that connects to the battery does not even extend outside the handle so it's very hard to connect it.
customer_reviews.author: smcfad

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your pocket
customer_reviews.text: Great piece to carry when I can’t take my firearm. Light weight, fits right in my pocket and worked right out of the box. No issues with mine. I did purchase a different Kydex holster as the one it comes with is not functional for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jason VerHelst

customer_reviews.title: Not on time delivery
customer_reviews.text: Delivery was not on time but item is exactly as stated. Excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Adams

customer_reviews.title: Don't shoot your eye out.
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect. However, the safety must be re-engaged in order to shut off the current...should be just letting go of the trigger. Strange.
customer_reviews.author: Vince

customer_reviews.title: Piece of mind
customer_reviews.text: Worthy of consideration for some of our seniors who can not legally possess a firearm and do not wish to become a victim of violent crime.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Cook

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it for personal protection without going straight to the Glock.
customer_reviews.author: davidmford

customer_reviews.title: Wow!!! Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: I like that you can use the taser without having to use the cartridges. I only dislike that the battery is not rechargeable. Update.. purchased it April 8th and still have no problems using. September 3, 2020. I have actually been able to test it and am very happy with the results. Have not had to buy a new battery yet.
customer_reviews.author: Angel

customer_reviews.title: If your gonna shoot someone make sure it takes them Dow
customer_reviews.text: Felt cheap in my hand like it didn’t have any substance to it. I refunded it back and I’m gonna buy a 9mm instead!
customer_reviews.author: George Englar

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: It’s easy to hold and use. I feel much more safe knowing that I have the taser with me.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Fontana

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: It is a great non lethal tool, it is wonderful and it's legal.
customer_reviews.author: hello83

customer_reviews.title: Not working after no use lazer site broken
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my work in security. The ((lazer site stopped working & battery voltage light and I've not yet used it but gone through 3 batteries)) wouldn't mind a replacement that actually worked for the price I payed but I'm sure that's not going to happen.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: batteries not described correctly
customer_reviews.text: The product appears to be as said, but the batteries I thought were rechargeable? Still a great product I hope I never have to use.
customer_reviews.author: jason andrews

customer_reviews.title: Work horse love it
customer_reviews.text: Compact fits in pocket i bought a kydex holster for carrying as well. Taser is solid in all forms.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Nelson

customer_reviews.title: Stopped Working!!!
customer_reviews.text: The laser pointer has stopped working. I’m not sure if the tased will work. I guess I’ll have to shoot it and waste a cartridge to ensure I’ll have true security. I reached out to the company via email and phone, to no avail. I have not gotten a response at all.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Never leave home without it
customer_reviews.text: Expensive yes, but a great defense. Customer service at tazer is amazing. A great non lethal alternative
customer_reviews.author: Paul Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Compact easy to conceal
customer_reviews.text: Compact, light and easy to conceal on your body or in a bigger pocket. It's about the size of a 380 auto or smaller 9mm. I got it to carry for protection in areas and work places that ban guns. It has a strobe light and laser built in which is awesome!
customer_reviews.author: RD207

customer_reviews.title: Haven't had to use it yet.
customer_reviews.text: Only problem is that the batteries died after only a few months in gun sitting on a table. But new batteries are easy to replace and only a few dollars each (for 2). Batteries from the store promise a 10 years shelf life so not sure why the company uses such cheap batteries to start with.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas R. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping Looks and fits good in your hand and yes I would buy again.Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: cabbie

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money!!
customer_reviews.text: I never even got to use it, I dropped it, then it would fire when I went to use it, and very hard to put battery in, biggest waste of money ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Terry lee calloway

customer_reviews.title: awesome  buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for self defense. Great product shipping was fast works 100% could not be happier
customer_reviews.author: Tony Fugere

customer_reviews.title: Satey
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice but was not delivered with battery pack like it was supposed to be will have to order one
customer_reviews.author: Tim Morris

customer_reviews.title: Sounds like it would hurt
customer_reviews.text: Havnt used it to tell you much about it. Sounds like it would hurt!
customer_reviews.author: Kyle Woods

customer_reviews.title: It only comes with 2 cartridges
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can change te batteries its really easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joel D. Saavedra

customer_reviews.title: Non lethal protection
customer_reviews.text: Very powerful. Laser sighting. Civilian version of the Taser used by law enforcement. Affordable non lethal personal protection.
customer_reviews.author: Curt Chappell

customer_reviews.title: cartridges are no longer sold to me!
customer_reviews.text: cartridges are no longer sold to me!cartridges are no longer sold to me!
customer_reviews.author: Aleksandrs Karpenko

customer_reviews.title: Bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: One of the best weapons I’ve had in a while. I carry as a security officer akin with my fire arm. It’s nice to know this product is reasonably priced, and delivers the same as then $1,000 versions
customer_reviews.author: The Private Detective

customer_reviews.title: ... seller was extremely helpful and the pulse is very nice light and wonderful since of security
customer_reviews.text: Shipping was slow but seller was extremely helpful and the pulse is very nice light and wonderful since of security. I would suggest purchasing the holster for the pulse.The one that comes with it is a dust cover.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas Thomas

customer_reviews.title: You can feel and see the power!
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Definitely seems like it has stopping power! As the electrons course through the target, it is easy to imagine how it must feel if they coursed through your body!
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: This product is the real deal. Showed it to ...
customer_reviews.text: This product is the real deal. Showed it to a sheriff and he confirmed that is the same teaser they use only mine is modified for civilian use. Product was delivered on time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best part, I haven't had to use it yet
customer_reviews.text: Best part, I haven't had to use it yet. But I'm glad I have this as an option for home defense.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Ogden

customer_reviews.title: Buy this for non-lethal protection
customer_reviews.text: Great Taser. Works just like the ones that cops carry.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Security
customer_reviews.text: I haven't used it yet, and hope I never do, but it gives me a non-lethal option for home security.
customer_reviews.author: Rdney W.

customer_reviews.title: CONCEAL CARRY LICENSE
customer_reviews.text: NEEDS A CONCEALED CARRY TO BE LEGAL DON'T BELIEVE WHAT YOU READ. ASK POLICE
customer_reviews.author: Anarchrist

product_meta.title: Taser Pulse with 2 Cartridges, LED Laser with/2 Cartridges, and Target,Black
product_meta.description: The TASER Pulse is a high-tech, subcompact weapon with an intuitive concealed carry design that packs the same knock-down punch used by law enforcement around the world. With the TASER Pulse you can reach an attacker from up to 15 feet away, immobilize them for 30 seconds giving you time to make a Safe Escape.

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
